featured.text: In 1990, Mitsubishi Electronics was reported to have announced the formation of a team composed entirely of AB workers, thanks to “their ability to make plans.”

definition.zh_def: 電子學，研究電子設備和電路的科學和技術。
definition.en_def: The branch of science and technology that deals with the design and application of electronic devices and circuits.
definition.example: She studied electronics to become an engineer.
